content.value:
The property is located in the best location in Bogota, close to Transmilenio, downtown , hospitals, and events place Corferias and close to Airport El dorado in Bogota.

Single, Double, Triple and Quadruple rooms with private bath , WiFi and coffee.

Boasting a shared lounge and a terrace, La Casa del Café Guesthouse is situated in Bogotá, 3.7 km from Corferias International Exhibition Center and 3.9 km from Bolivar Square. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Quevedo's Jet is 4.2 km from the hostel and T Zone is 9 km away.

At the hostel rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom.
A continental breakfast is available each morning at La Casa del Café Guesthouse.
Luis Angel Arango Library is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while El Campin Stadium is 4 km from the property.

description.description: Hostal Casa del Cafe has a great accommodation and service to offer. We have free coffee all the time you want it, and we have internet WiFi in all the hotel areas. We include simple breakfast and all the people is welcome.
